results.title: White House Summit Aims to De-Risk AI Supply Chain Vulnerabilities
results.snippet: The United States is leading a diplomatic initiative with eight allied nations—including Japan, South Korea, and Australia—to forge secure supply chains for the critical minerals and advanced semiconductors essential to the artificial intelligence sector.
